title: WMacro?
content:
I found this face on W’s website. I think it is called WMacro but I cannot find it anywhere else. I am interested in finding it and it’s family (if it exists).

It is the large orange type on this page (Editors) [http://velocitysp.com/hillsborohttp://velocitysp.com/hillsboro](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121635/http:/velocitysp.com/hillsborohttp:/velocitysp.com/hillsboro "http://velocitysp.com/hillsborohttp://velocitysp.com/hillsboro")

 [‹ 47 new lead character sets printed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121635/http:/typophile.com/node/43444 "Go to previous forum topic") [Easter brush script frenzy!... any idea about the NOW NOW face? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121635/http:/typophile.com/node/43450 "Go to next forum topic")
author: L15A
